title.en: A Supplication to the Illustrious Zhepa Dorje1

text.en: Namo gurubhyaḥ!
Emaho!
text.en-trans: emaho

text.en: Holder of the White Lotus,2embodiment of all the buddhas' compassion—
text.en-trans: gyal kün tukjé rang zuk pekar chang

text.en: Tenderness and wisdom magically displaying for beings.
text.en-trans: dro la jé tsé yeshe gyumé gar

text.en: Glorious master ofprāṇa-mind,3commander of sorcery—4
text.en-trans: lungsem wang tob tutob ngadak pal

text.en: Illustrious Laughing Vajra, to you, I pray.
text.en-trans: jetsün zhepa dorjér solwa deb

text.en: In this life, future lives, and in the bardos, stay with me and guide me.
text.en-trans: di chi bar sum dralmé jezung té

text.en: In this life, now that my heart5has been drawn to the authentic path,
text.en-trans: tsé dir yangdak lam la lo drang né

text.en: With my being liberated by the four reorientations6
text.en-trans: lo dok zhi yi dak gyü drolwa dang

text.en: And saturated by the burgeoning of wishing and engaging bodhicitta,
text.en-trans: mönjuk sem kyi nyugü gyü len té

text.en: May I manage to sail beyond the ocean of cyclic existence.
text.en-trans: sipa khorwé gyatso gal nü shok

text.en: Above all, relying on the meaning of the luminous vajra essence7
text.en-trans: khyepar ösal dorjé nyingpö dön

text.en: Contained in the personal instructions of the lineage-holding guru,
text.en-trans: gyüden lamé mengak la ten né

text.en: And never erring in the key points of action,
text.en-trans: lé gyi né la gol chuk mepa ru

text.en: May I maintain a continuous flow of self-knowing dharmakāya—
text.en-trans: ku sum drebu nyamjor gongpé dön

text.en: The ultimate meaning of the unified fruition of the three kāyas.
text.en-trans: rangrig chökü tensi zinpar shok

text.en: If I fail to merge with the self-knowing expanse,
text.en-trans: galté rangrig long du ma gyur na

text.en: Then, as I remain connected to you, illustrious guru,
text.en-trans: jetsün lama khyé dang yermé par

text.en: Please guide me to the pure paradise of Khecarā.8
text.en-trans: dakpa khachö zhing du drenpar shok

text.en: Once I'm born in that paradise, though I will be free in the expanse
text.en-trans: zhing der kyé né rigdzin tönkhor gyi

text.en: Of the teacher and retinue's minds merged as one,
text.en-trans: gongpa yermé long du drol né kyang

text.en: Bless me to appear again before whoever needs me
text.en-trans: lar yang gang dul drowé dön nyi kün

text.en: That I may effortlessly and perfectly bring about the range of beings' two benefits.9
text.en-trans: bemé yongsu drubpar jingyi lob
